text: Hianagi tamagrikura Ra Anumzamofo pristi eri'za vahere hu'za nehu'za, tagri Anumzamofo avuga eri'za eneriza vahere hu'za tamagrikura hugahaze. Ana nehanageta kokankoka vahe'mo'za eri'za eme tamamisnaza zagofenoreti ne'zana neneta, ana vahe'mokizmi feno zante rantamagia enerita tamimiza runafage hugahaze.
